Label: Purpose
Provider: To clarify which organization holds the resource or acts as the custodian for the metadata record and to help users understand which resources they can access.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Provider: This field can be any string value. However, if the value corresponds to the name of an SVG icon in GeoBlacklight, the icon will display next to the title. See the GeoBlacklight documentation on [adding SVG Icons](https://geoblacklight.org/docs/adding_svg_icons/) for more details.

Label: Commentary
Provider: This field was named **Provenance** in the GBL 1.0 metadata schema.
